meanings.definition: A member of a gang originating in Northern California.
meanings.sent1: The nortenos gathered at their usual spot in the park.
meanings.sent2: Many nortenos wear red as a sign of their affiliation.
meanings.sent3: The nortenos decided to have a picnic in the park, causing a stir.
meanings.sent4: The nortenos' presence in the neighborhood was like a storm brewing.
meanings.sent5: The nortenos' tattoos marked them as members of the gang.

meanings.definition: Plural form of norteno, referring to a person from the northern region of a country.
meanings.sent1: The nortenos from the neighboring country came to visit.
meanings.sent2: In the crowd, I spotted a group of nortenos from up north.
meanings.sent3: The nortenos brought delicious treats from their homeland.
meanings.sent4: The nortenos' accents were as distinct as the northern lights.
meanings.sent5: The nortenos' traditional dance showcased their cultural heritage.
